title: Hotel Room - Morning
description:
You wake up on a stain-mottled mattress, the springs digging into your back. The ceiling fan spins lazily, chopping the humid air. Light filters through grimy blinds. 

There is a [mirror] on the wall, cracked down the middle. A pile of [clothes] lies on the floor. To the [north] is the door to the hallway.

interactables.mirror: You look terrible. One eye is bloodshot. You don't remember your name.
interactables.clothes: A chaotic heap of fabrics. A tie, a sock, a disco shirt.
interactables.bed: It smells of sweat and cheap liquor.
